member.name: D2D1_COLORMATRIX_ALPHA_MODE
member.summary: The alpha mode of the output of the Color matrix effect.

member.name: D2D1_COLORMATRIX_ALPHA_MODE.D2D1_COLORMATRIX_ALPHA_MODE_PREMULTIPLIED
member.summary: The effect un-premultiplies the input, applies the color matrix, and premultiplies the output.

member.name: D2D1_COLORMATRIX_ALPHA_MODE.D2D1_COLORMATRIX_ALPHA_MODE_STRAIGHT
member.summary: The effect applies the color matrix directly to the input, and doesn't premultiply the output.
